attributes.name: cn
attributes.description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: departmentNumber
attributes.description: identifies a department within an organization

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: preferred name to be used when displaying entries

attributes.name: distinguishedName
attributes.description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: employeeNumber
attributes.description: numerically identifies an employee within an organization

attributes.name: employeeType
attributes.description: type of employment for a person

attributes.name: givenName
attributes.description: first name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: initials
attributes.description: initials of some or all of names, but not the surname(s).

attributes.name: ou
attributes.description: organizational unit this object belongs to

attributes.name: preferredLanguage
attributes.description: preferred written or spoken language for a person

attributes.name: sn
attributes.description: last (family) name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: st
attributes.description: state or province which this object resides in

attributes.name: accountFlags
attributes.description: List of the flags enabled on an account

attributes.name: msDS-PrincipalName
attributes.description: Name of the entity in the format "NetBIOS domain name\sAMAccountName"

attributes.name: userPrincipalName
attributes.description: The unique name of the entity within the domain, in the format "name@domain"

attributes.name: externalEmailAddress
attributes.description: External email address of Mail User

attributes.name: dNSHostName
attributes.description: Fully Qualified Domain Name for the Service Account

attributes.name: msDS-ManagedPasswordInterval
attributes.description: Password change interval in days for the Managed Service Account

attributes.name: msDS-SupportedEncryptionTypes
attributes.description: Supported Encryption Types for the Managed Service Account

attributes.name: msDS-GroupMSAMembership
attributes.description: Principals allowed to use Group Managed Service Account

attributes.name: msDS-AllowedToActOnBehalfOfOtherIdentity
attributes.description: Principals that can act on the behalf of Group Managed Service Account

attributes.name: servicePrincipalName
attributes.description: Service principal names for the Service Account

attributes.name: shadowAccountDN
attributes.description: DistinguishedName of the Linked Mailbox shadow account

attributes.name: shadowAccountGuid
attributes.description: ObjectGuid of the Linked Mailbox shadow account

attributes.name: msExchRecipientTypeDetails
attributes.description: Type of the Microsoft Exchange recipient object

attributes.name: memberOfSharedMailbox
attributes.description: List of Shared Mailboxes to which user has permissions

attributes.name: cn
attributes.description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: distinguishedName
attributes.description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: ou
attributes.description: organizational unit this object belongs to

attributes.name: msDS-PrincipalName
attributes.description: Name of the entity in the format "NetBIOS domain name\sAMAccountName"

attributes.name: cn
attributes.description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: distinguishedName
attributes.description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: msDS-PrincipalName
attributes.description: Name of the entity in the format "NetBIOS domain name\sAMAccountName"

attributes.name: fullAccess
attributes.description: List of user mailbox having full access permission on the Shared Mailbox

attributes.name: sendAs
attributes.description: List of user mailbox having 'Send As' permission on the Shared Mailbox

attributes.name: sendOnBehalf
attributes.description: List of user mailbox having 'Send on behalf' permission on the Shared Mailbox
